task: Develop a basic 'Zelda' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Allow an easement (an easement is the abandonment of a stricture)'.
name: Legend of the Open Path

branding_data.short_description: Embark on an open-ended adventure in a world where strict paths are abandoned.
branding_data.detailed_description: Legend of the Open Path is an adventure game inspired by the classic 'Zelda' series, but with a twist: the world is designed to encourage exploration and non-linear progression. In this game, players are not bound by strict quests or linear paths. Instead, they can freely explore the vast world, discover hidden secrets, and tackle challenges in any order they choose. This approach allows players to experience the game in a unique way, forging their own path through the landscape. The game features a rich narrative, engaging puzzles, and a dynamic combat system, all set in a beautifully crafted open world.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
strategy: Allow an easement (an easement is the abandonment of a stricture)
